problem.markdown:
>>Using the Replace Values step, how many distinct values can be replaced at a time?<<
(x) One ( ) Two ( ) Three ( ) Ten
[explanation] You can replace one distinct value at a time using the Replace Values step. [explanation]
problem.p: Using the Replace Values step, how many distinct values can be replaced at a time?
